Text:
Do not upload the same item more than once.
Your other upload of this has been deleted.

sorry, first time uploading a torrent,
i tried to delete the first one myself
but i wasn't able to.

A lot of things get stuck in submission and it gets hard to delete them.

But this looks invaluable for us System Shock fans. Thank you so much :)

Hm, I downloaded this and the portable one works fine (besides the fact that the highest resolution is 640x480 LOL forgot how old this was)

But the actual iso one has the same problems as everything else, hitting panel does nothing, hitting install does nothing.

Ah wait, testing before I hit submit, run as admin opened it up.


Running as administrator is probably required for installation.
